sentences.en: " Glad to see you,'said the latter, grasping his hand lightly.
sentences.cn: “ 很高兴见到你, " 赫斯渥和他轻轻地握了手,说道.

sentences.en: He compared the achievements of the British and the French during 1916 and concluded that the latter were better all around.
sentences.cn: 他比较了1916年英国人和法国人的成就，结论是法国人在各方面都做得更好。

sentences.en: He holds the belief that he is a latter-day prophet.
sentences.cn: 他深信自己是当代先知。

sentences.en: He tracked down his cousin and uncle. The latter was sick.
sentences.cn: 他追查到了堂弟和叔叔的下落，发现叔叔这时正在病中。

sentences.en: He'll go to school in the latter part of the year.
I would unhesitatingly choose the latter option.
sentences.cn: 我会毫不犹豫地选择后者。

sentences.en: In his latter years religious mania clouded his mind.
sentences.cn: 晚年的时候，对宗教的狂热让他丧失心智。

sentences.en: In the latter case, buyers pay a 15% commission.
sentences.cn: 在后一种情况下，买家付15%的佣金。

sentences.en: Of the two choices, I prefer the latter.
sentences.cn: 在两种中选择, 我要后者.

sentences.en: Of the two the latter is better than the former.
The latter laughed gleefully as she saw the hand coming her way.
sentences.cn: 嘉莉看到自己要赢这一盘了,开心地笑了.

sentences.en: The latter point is the most important.
sentences.cn: 后面提及的那一点是最重要的。

sentences.en: The windows would probably have been crafted in the latter part of the Middle Ages.
sentences.cn: 这些窗户很可能是中世纪后期精心制作的。

sentences.en: Then some of the latter's impression forced itself upon him.
sentences.cn: 接着他注意到后者的一些表情.

sentences.en: There are the people who speak after they think and the people who think while they're speaking. Mike definitely belongs in the latter category.
sentences.cn: 有些人开口之前会三思,而有些人想到什么就说什么.迈克绝对属于后者.

sentences.en: Where unemployment and crime are high, it can be assumed that the latter is due to the former.
sentences.cn: 如果某地失业率和犯罪率都很高，可以认为后者是前者造成的。

trans.tran_en: being the second of two people or things, or the last in a list just mentioned
the second of two people or things just mentioned
the second of two people or things just mentioned
